title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 636 - State Aid For Environmental Management Councils And For Conservation Advisory Councils

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 636

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §47-0115, current local assistance budget bill, and General Municipal Law, art. 12-F
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
